item.title: Find Code Duplicates with Sublime Text
item.description: Code duplication is the worst practice ever, right? Well, actually there might be situations where duplicating can be better than factoring out, but these are very rare.

item.title: Are anonymous Lambda style event handlers a readability killer?
Comments smell! Replace them with more expressive code.
